goals.complete: Together with Sergeant Jeyne and the Ebon Vanguard, Forgal and I managed to overrun and defeat Ajax Anvilburn and his renegades. The treaty signing is safe, and General Almorra will be very pleased.

We returned to Almorra with the good news of our successful mission in Ebonhawke. My next duty is to speak with one of the minor races. If I help solve their troubles, perhaps I can convince them to join the Vigil.
